list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an amount to be paid for an insurance policy.
a sum added to an ordinary price or charge.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: customers are reluctant to pay a premium for organic fruit
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Khách hàng không muốn trả phí bảo hiểm cho trái cây hữu cơ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: something given as a reward, prize, or incentive.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the Society of Arts awarded him a premium
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hiệp hội nghệ thuật trao cho anh ta một phí bảo hiểm
